resources.string: "Snapcodes let you easily add friends. Just take a screenshot of a Snapcode, and then open Snapchat!"
"Snapcodes let you easily add friends. Enable auto-add Snapcodes, take a screenshot of a Snapcode, and then open Snapchat!"

"Friends who have your phone number in their address book will be able to find you on Snapchat.
We won't spam or auto-add your friends.
Read our "Privacy Policy to learn more.
Snapchat uses the phone numbers in your address book to help you find your friends.
Snapchat could not find any contacts.
Could not remove as a friend. Please try again.
is how you will appear to Snapchatters you add.
"Tap a photo with a Snapcode to add that Snapchatter!"
%1$s is a collection of Snaps from users at the event. It appears in your Stories until the end of the event. Happy Snapping!
Add Nearby uses your location to find and add nearby Snapchatters. Your name will be visible to other Snapchatters.
Adding a Snap to your Story allows others to view your Snap an unlimited number of times for 24 hours. Would you like to add this Snap to your Story?
%1$s is a collection of Snaps from users at the event. It appears in your Stories until the end of the event. Happy Snapping!
Are you sure you want to abandon your Snapsterpiece?
To add a friend, ask them to open Add Nearby.
On some devices, Snapchat adjusts audio settings to let you video chat.
Use your microphone to record audio for Snaps and video chat.
"Snapchat will automatically add Snapcodes from your device's photos."

"Thank you for installing Snapchat Beta! As a beta tester, you'll be able to enjoy our newest features while helping us to work out the kinks.
Thank you for making Snapchat awesome!"
Let us know your reason for blocking them?
You will be removed from their friends and they will not be able to re-add you from this account unless you unblock them.
Are you sure you want to block %1$s?
Are you sure you want to block %1$s - %2$s
Insert an SD card to record video
Cannot play video without an SD card

Checking SD card. Please try again in a moment.
There is a problem with your SD card
Cannot record when SD card is connected to a computer. Disconnect your USB cable.
Could not unlink card. Please try again.
There was an error loading the images. Please ensure you have a good internet connection and try again.
"You didn't identify all of the images. Please try again."
Card blocked due to unusual activity.
By continuing, you are giving this information to both Snapchat and Square pursuant to their respective privacy policies.
Card linked with too many accounts.
"Please use a debit card issued by a bank in the United States."
You are not eligible to use Snapcash at this time.
Please verify a US phone number before using Snapcash.
" I am at least 18 years old and agree to the "Square Agreement and Square Privacy Policy". "
Snapcash is a team effort between Snapchat and Square. When you sign up for Snapcash, we will create a Square account that will securely process your payments.
Set a good password by using a combination of lowercase and uppercase letters, numbers, and symbols.

CHARGE REVERSED DUE TO UNUSUAL ACTIVITY

Please verify your phone number before using Snapcash.
YOU TOOK A SCREENSHOT OF CHAT!
Please check your connection and try again.
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
"This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play Services.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
This app requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
Are you sure you want to delete your Snapkidz account? This action cannot be undone.
Connect an SD card to view video Snaps!
Autofill your full name when you edit it in Snapchat settings, for your convenience.
"We may collect and use information from your device's address book so that you can invite friends and we can improve the app."
Media download failed - tap to retry
Loading indicator for a Discover Edition
Could not delete. Please try again.
Could not hide. Please try again.
Snapchat was unable to open the camera. You may need to restart the application or your device.

Could not refresh Stories. Please try again.
Could not send. Please try again
Could not delete Snap. Please try again.

To free up space on your phone, try deleting unused apps, music, or photos.
Connect an SD card to view Discover!
"Press and hold to send to a friend."
Press and hold to send to a friend!
%1$s does not allow sending of this Snap.

"Sorry!
Discover is currently unavailable for your device."

"Sorry!
Discover is currently unavailable in your region."
This is how you appear to Snapchatters you add.
Please, DO NOT Snap and drive.
For your security, please enter your password.
By verifying a new email address, %1$s will no longer be associated with your account.
"We've sent you a verification email! Please open the confirmation link to finish verifying your email address."
Your email address is used to log in and to secure your Snapchat account
We will not send you junk mail or expose your email address to other Snapchatters.
Please verify your email address. Your email address is used to log in and to secure your Snapchat account

Find friends in your address book.
Use your flash to take better photos in the dark.
Send and receive Snaps, chats, and other data.
An error occurred. Please try again.
Snapchat would like to access your contacts. Your contacts will be transmitted to our servers and used to find your friends.
Press and hold to share live video!
Add me on Snapchat! Username: %1$s https://www.snapchat.com/download?ref=a
We temporarily use your location to determine eligibility for Smart Filters and Our Story. Snapchat will not store your location.
We temporarily use your location to find your friends who are also searching nearby. Snapchat will not store your location.
Snapchat wants to use your location
Location Services are off on your device. Turn them on in Android Settings to add nearby friends.
"We use your device's location to enable our location-based features like Geofilters, Live Stories and Add Nearby."
%1$s is already taken! Login with that email address or try another one.
For your security, please enter your password.
Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
"Save Snaps and Stories to your device's photo gallery. Snapchat also uses your device's storage to save settings and cache content you send and receive."
"Your friend's device doesn't support live video :("
Snap and Chat failed to send
This Our Story is visible to Snapchatters also at this location (or who were here in the last 24 hours).
These are Snaps that you have submitted to %1$s.
To set a new password, please enter your current password first.
Card declined. Please contact your bank.
Card expired. Please link a new card.
Error sending cash. Please try again.
This payment would put you past your weekly sending limit.
Payment failed due to unusual activity.
"Snapchat uses the following permissions while you're using the app."
We will send a verification code to %1$s. To complete your phone number verification, enter the 6-digit verification code.

"We will not display your phone number to other Snapchatters.
Read our "Privacy Policy to learn more.
Friends who have your phone number in their address book will be able to find you on Snapchat.
"Please verify your phone number... so we know it's real!"
Your username is your unique identity on Snapchat!
Use your camera to take Snaps, video chat, and add friends by pointing your camera at their Snapcode.

"While you're at %1$s, you may submit Snaps to %2$s. The Snaps that are selected will be posted to the official %3$s and may be viewed by anyone who has added %4$s. Every time you submit a Snap to %5$s, %6$s will be added as your friend for 24 hours. To opt out of this location-based feature, turn off Filters in Settings."
"Your screen won't automatically turn off while you're using Snapchat."
There was a problem connecting to the server. Please try again.
There was a problem opening the image you selected. Please try again.
Your selfie will be shown to other Snapchatters.
Are you sure you want to remove your existing profile picture?
%1$s Your contacts and settings live here.
This feature is not available on this version. Please update your app.
Receive notifications when friends contact you on Snapchat, when other Snapchatters add you, and for other important events.
Autofill your phone number when you register for Snapchat, for your convenience.
Read the contents of your USB storage
"Snapchat automatically loads app settings that you've previously saved."
Receive Snaps and chats, and other content from other Snapchatters.
Autofill the SMS code that Snapchat sends you during phone number verification, for your convenience.
Are you sure you want to exit signup? You can return to this later.
Are you sure you want to exit signup? You may lose access to the account you have begun creating.
It looks like you logged in on another device with your Snapcash account. For your security, please relink your debit card before sending cash.
Would you like to replay this Snap from %1$s? You can only do this once per day.
This will save your entire story to your gallery.
Save failed :( Snaps are still loading. Please try again.
Search your contacts or add friends by their username.
Your phone number is now confirmed for password resets
This will send %1$s from the bank account tied to your debit card.
Are you sure you want to send money?
Are you sure you want to clear your feed?
This will clear all your conversations from your feed. It will not delete any saved or sent messages in your conversations.
Are you sure you want to clear this conversation?
This will clear the conversation from your feed. It will not delete any saved or sent messages in your conversation.
Could not clear conversations. Please try again.
Could not clear conversation. Please try again.
Are you sure you want to log out?
"Snapchat Beta allows you to test drive our newest features. As a Beta tester, you'll receive our latest code updates while helping to make Snapchat more stable."
Block friends from seeing your Story.
Location Services are off on your device. Turn them on in Android Settings to enable all filters.
Certain features, like Smart Filters and Our Story, request your location.
Allow my friends to find me
Failed to change number of Best Friends
How are we doing? Rate Snapchat on Google Play!
Snapchat is more fun with friends! Are you sure you want to skip this step?
Snapchatters can add you by pointing their camera at your Snapcode and tapping their screen!
Special thanks to Richard Pattis for use of Karel The Robot :)
Sorry! That Snap can no longer be posted.
Looks like you were interrupted while swiping cash to %1$s. Please try again.
Tap to view the full story
Tap to view this video in Discover
Our %1$s and %2$s have changed. By tapping Accept, you agree to the revised Snapchat %3$s and %4$s.
Please enable Location Services with High Accuracy location mode (GPS) on your device.
Please verify a phone number before using login verification.
If this number is incorrect, you can change it
For your security, please enter your password.
Please verify a phone number before using two factor authentication.
"We've sent a code to %1$s. Please enter the code below to enable login verification."
With login verification, we will send a text message to %1$s with a code whenever you log in on a new device.
"The following device is verified with your Snapchat account. To log in to this device, you'll only need your password."
Lose access to one of your verified devices? Forget it!
"The following devices are verified with your Snapchat account. To log in to these devices, you'll need only your password."
"We haven't remembered any devices for you yet."
If you log in with this device, you will have to verify it again.
Are you sure you want to forget this device?
"You've changed your phone number. We've disabled login verification — go to Settings to re-enable it."
Write this somewhere safe. You can use this code once instead of the one we text you to log back into your account.
If you lose your phone or change your mobile number, you might not be able to log in. A recovery code can help you get back into your account.
"You've used your recovery code to log in. We've disabled login verification — go to Settings to re-enable it."
"When you disable login verification, we'll only check your password when you log in on new devices."
Login verification helps keep your account more secure. In addition to your password, you will need to enter a code sent to your phone to log in on new devices.
"We've noticed you're logging in on a new device, so we've sent a text message with a code to your phone number %1$s. Please enter it below to verify your identity."
%1$s sent you a message, but you need to upgrade Snapchat to view it. Upgrade now!
Are you sure you want to unlink your debit card?
Only U.S. phone numbers are supported at this time.
By creating an account, you agree to the Terms of Use and you acknowledge that you have read the Privacy Policy". "
Snapchat v%1$s" Made in Los Angeles"
Turn on vibration for Snapchat notifications.
Snapchat optimizes Snap delivery based on the strength of your internet connection.
Snapchat optimizes Snap quality based on the strength of your Wi-Fi connection.
